author: Danielle Goodwin
text:
As I sit at my desk trying to gather valuable resources for local governments relating to Energy Star, I realized I am getting lost in all the information on the world wide web. With that being said, I would like to ask local government officials, staff members, and residences to respond to this question with Energy Star topics you'd like to know more about. 
Examples: Energy Star Financing for local governments; successful energy star related policies; how local governments incorporate energy efficiency in affordable housing projects, etc.
title: Energy Star and Local Governments
